sections.summary:
College prepared student with over three years of front line customer service experience, excellent communication skills, with strong work ethic.
Looking for opportunities in Corporate America to develop as a career professional where training, coaching, and mentoring opportunities are
available. Teachable and quick to learn taking on new roles and responsibilities with flexible schedule. *Detail and Deadline Oriented *Critical
Thinking *Superior Writing Skills
Highlights
Microsoft Office Suite *Avaya Phone System *Very accurate and rapid keyboarder *Sprout Social Media Management
